connector.description: Send message to an AWS SQS FIFO Queue

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.queueNam.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.queueNameOrArn
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.queueNam.description: The SQS Queue name or ARN

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.accessKe.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.accessKe.description: The access key obtained from AWS

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.secretKe.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.secretKe.description: The secret key obtained from AWS

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.region.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.region
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.region.description: The AWS region to connect to Example: eu-west-1

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.contentB.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.contentBasedDeduplication
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.contentB.description: Use content-based deduplication (should be enabled in the SQS FIFO queue first)

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.autoCrea.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.autoCreateQueue
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.autoCrea.description: Setting the autocreation of the SQS queue.
